entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Belleville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:56 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Fog, 5.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Trenton 11:40 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
Condition: Fog
Temperature: 5.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 5.2°C
Wind: WSW 24 km/h gust 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday night: A few showers. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Showers. Fog patches developing this evening and dissipating overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 50 gusting to 80 near midnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 early in the afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers in the evening then clear. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
